title: Chekka Chivantha Vaanam
Synopsis: Chekka Chivantha Vaanam (English: Crimson Red Sky) is an upcoming Indian Tamil-language crime thriller film co-written and directed by Mani Ratnam. The film features an ensemble cast including Arvind Swami, Vijay Sethupathi, Jyothika, Silambarasan, Arun Vijay, Aishwarya Rajesh, Dayana Erappa and Aditi Rao Hydari in the lead roles, while Prakash Raj, Jayasudha, Thiagarajan and Mansoor Ali Khan appearring in pivotal roles
leadActors: Arvind Swami, Vijay Sethupathi, Prakash Raj
cast: Prakash Raj,Jayasudha, Aravind Swami, Vijay Sethupathi, Silambarasan, Arun Vijay, Jyothika, Aditi Rao Hydari, Aishwarya Rajesh, Dayana Erappa

title: Saami 2
Synopsis: is a 2018 Tamil language action masala film, written and directed by Hari and produced by Shibu Thameens. It stars Vikram in the dual role with [2] Aishwarya Rajesh and Keerthy Suresh as the female leads alongside Prabhu, Bobby Simha, and Soori in supporting roles. The film is a sequel to the 2003 film Saamy. The film was released on 21 September 2018, and received mixed reviews from critics
cast: Vikram, Aishwarya Rajesh and Keerthy Suresh as the female leads alongside Prabhu, Bobby Simha, and Soori

title: Oattai Padam
cast: Vikra, and Keerthy Suresh as the female leads alongside Prabhu, Bobby Simha, and Soori
